content.1: And there was a man of mount Ephraim, whose name
content.2: And he said unto his mother, The eleven hundred
content.3: And when he had restored the eleven hundred
content.4: Yet he restored the money unto his mother; and his mother took two hundred
content.5: And the man Micah had an house of gods, and made an ephod, and teraphim, and consecrated one of his sons, who became his priest.

content.8: And the man departed out of the city from Beth-lehem-judah to sojourn where he could find
content.9: And Micah said unto him, Whence comest thou? And he said unto him, I
content.10: And Micah said unto him, Dwell with me, and be unto me a father and a priest, and I will give thee ten
content.11: And the Levite was content to dwell with the man; and the young man was unto him as one of his sons.
content.12: And Micah consecrated the Levite; and the young man became his priest, and was in the house of Micah.
